samples.instruction: Scholarship-ku apply panna enna document venum-pa?
samples.current_output: Aadhaar, bank passbook (student name-la), income certificate, community certificate, marks card, photo, bonafide - ipdi ellam venum. Original + xerox + scan ready-a vechikko/vechikunga.

samples.instruction: En kuzhanthai methuvaga padikkudhu, school-la special help irukkaa?
samples.current_output: Slow learners support: 1) NEET programme - remedial classes 2) Resource teachers in schools 3) Learning disability screening available 4) Extra coaching hours - afternoon sessions 5) IEDSS for special needs. School-la class teacher-a santhiyunga. BRC special educators ullana. Private assessment: Rs.500-2000 at government hospitals. Early intervention helps - don't delay.

samples.instruction: Isai Kuzhu, Naatiya Kuzhu competitions la win pannina enna benefit?
samples.current_output: District/State level-la win pannina certificate, cash prize kedaikum. College admission-la extra marks weightage undu. Cultural quota-la admission peralaam. State artist-aaga recognition kedaikum.

samples.instruction: Scholarship-ku thevaiyana documents ennenna?
samples.current_output: Standard documents: 1) Aadhaar card 2) Bank passbook (student name) 3) Income certificate (latest) 4) Caste/Community certificate 5) Bonafide certificate from institution 6) Previous year marks card 7) Passport size photo 8) Fee receipt. Special cases: Disability certificate, EWS certificate, BPL card, domicile certificate. Tip: Keep original + 3 photocopies + scanned PDF ready.

samples.instruction: Final year-à®² à®‡à®°à¯à®•à¯à®•à¯‡à®©à¯. Government job prepare à®ªà®£à¯à®£à®£à¯à®®à¯. Campus placement-à® à®µà®¿à®Ÿà®²à®¾à®®à®¾?
samples.current_output: Don't skip placement! Reasons: 1) Government job = uncertain timeline (1-3 years) 2) Private job = income while preparing 3) Age limit allows both 4) Financial independence. Strategy: Campus placement attend + clear any job â†’ Join â†’ Prepare TNPSC/SSC evenings/weekends â†’ Clear govt exam â†’ Resign â†’ Join government. Many success stories of working professionals clearing exams. Private job experience also valued. Safety net important - family shouldn't struggle while you prepare.

samples.instruction: Board exam-la Re-totalling vs Re-valuation - enna difference?
samples.current_output: Re-totalling: Marks addition only check. Answer sheet re-read illai. Cost: â‚¹50/subject. Time: 10-15 days. Success rate: Low. Re-valuation: Full paper re-evaluation by new examiner. Cost: â‚¹300-500/subject. Time: 30-45 days. Success rate: Higher if genuine mistake. Apply within: 15 days of result. Portal: DGE website. Choose wisely - re-valuation for major doubt only.

samples.instruction: Education loan thiruppich seluthuvathu eppadi?
samples.current_output: Repayment: Padippu mudintha piragu + 6 months to 1 year moratorium. EMI thodangum. Repayment period: 5-15 years. Tax benefit: Section 80E-la vatti-ku deduction (no max limit, up to 8 years). Pre-closure penalty illai most banks-la. Auto-debit setup seithu EMI thavaramal kattunga.

samples.instruction: ITI padippu yarukku errathu? Eppadi seruvathu?
samples.current_output: 8th or 10th pass aanavargalukku. 130+ types of trades irukku (Electrician, Fitter, Welder, Computer Operator etc). Admission: www.skilltraining.tn.gov.in. Duration: 6 months to 2 years. Govt ITI fully free. Padicha approm Apprenticeship seiyalam, nalla job opportunity.

Age: 14-40 years. Apply: www.skilltraining.tn.gov.in. Selection: 10th/8th marks basis. No entrance exam. Documents: TC, marks card, community certificate, Aadhaar. samples.instruction: Aadhaar-bank account link à®†à®•à®², scholarship reject
samples.current_output: Linking steps: 1) Visit bank branch with Aadhaar 2) Fill seeding form 3) OTP verification 4) 48-72 hours to reflect. Check link status: Call bank customer care or use NPCI mapper. Common issues: Name mismatch (Aadhaar vs bank) - get corrected first. Multiple accounts: Only one can be primary for DBT. Alternative: Net banking/Mobile banking link option available. UIDAI website: Check Aadhaar-bank link status.

samples.instruction: Myth or Fact: Myth: Government school-la padichaa success aaga mudiyaadhu
samples.current_output: Fact: Fact: Pala IAS officers, Doctors, Engineers government school products. 7.5% reservation pona piragu government school NEET toppers athigaritthullanar. Quality depends on student effort + teacher dedication. Many district toppers from government schools. Free education + scholarships = excellent opportunity.

samples.instruction: Hardware and Networking course padikkalaamaa?
samples.current_output: Good career option. Courses: 1) CCNA (Cisco) - Networking 2) CompTIA A+ - Hardware 3) MCSE (Microsoft) - Server admin 4) Hardware & Networking diploma. Duration: 3-12 months. Jobs: 1) Network administrator 2) System support 3) Hardware technician 4) IT helpdesk. Salary: â‚¹15,000-30,000. Demand: Every company needs IT support. NIELIT offers recognized courses. Self-employment: Computer repair shop.

samples.instruction: NEET-à®•à¯à®•à¯ à®à®ªà¯à®ªà®Ÿà®¿ prepare à®šà¯†à®¯à¯à®µà®¤à¯? à®à®¨à¯à®¤ books à®ªà®Ÿà®¿à®•à¯à®•à®£à¯à®®à¯?
samples.current_output:
**NEET Preparation Strategy:**

**2-Year Plan (Class 11-12):**

**Class 11:**
- NCERT thoroughly (Most important!)
- Concept clarity focus
- Regular practice
- Foundation building

**Class 12:**
- NCERT revision
- Previous years papers
- Mock tests
- Weak areas focus

**Subject-wise Books:**

**Physics:**
| Book | Purpose |
|------|--------|
| NCERT Class 11 & 12 | Foundation (Must!) |
| HC Verma | Concept + Problems |
| DC Pandey | Practice |
| Previous Years | Pattern understanding |

**Chemistry:**
| Book | Purpose |
|------|--------|
| NCERT | Must read multiple times! |
| MS Chouhan (Organic) | Organic mechanisms |
| VK Jaiswal (Inorganic) | Reactions |
| N Awasthi (Physical) | Numericals |

**Biology:**
| Book | Purpose |
|------|--------|
| NCERT | 90% questions from here! |
| Trueman's Biology | Extra MCQs |
| MTG NEET Guide | Practice |
| Previous Years | Must solve |

**Daily Schedule (Class 12):**
```
5:00 AM - Wake up, Fresh
5:30-7:30 AM - Physics/Chemistry (Alternate)
7:30-8:30 AM - Break, Breakfast
8:30-1:00 PM - School
2:00-4:00 PM - Biology
4:00-5:00 PM - Break, Snacks
5:00-7:00 PM - Weak subject
7:00-8:00 PM - Dinner, Relax
8:00-10:00 PM - Revision/MCQs
10:00 PM - Sleep
```

**Key Tips:**
1. NCERT = Bible (Read 5-6 times minimum)
2. Biology diagrams daily practice
3. Physics numericals daily
4. Chemistry equations balance
5. 50-100 MCQs daily
6. Weekly full-length test

samples.instruction: Scholarship deadlines summary
samples.current_output: NSP (National): October-November. Post-matric SC/ST: September-October. BC/MBC welfare: August-September. Merit scholarships: After results announcement. INSPIRE: December-January. Private scholarships: Various - check Buddy4Study regularly. Tip: Apply within 2 weeks of portal opening.

samples.instruction: Free uniform, books ellam school kodukkuma? Apply pannanuuma?
samples.current_output: Government school benefits: 1) Free textbooks - ella subjects 2) Free notebooks - 4-5 books 3) Free uniform - 2 sets (â‚¹600 worth) 4) Free footwear - Class 1-5 5) Free school bag - select schools. Apply: Admission-aanavudan automatic. Documents: Birth certificate, Aadhaar, parent Aadhaar, address proof. Private aided schools-layum books free. Distribution: June-July school opening.

samples.instruction: ME/M.Tech admission Tamil Nadu-la eppadi?
samples.current_output: GATE score compulsory (govt colleges-ku). Steps: 1) GATE ezhuthunga 2) Anna University TANCA counselling-ku apply 3) GATE score + UG marks basis rank 4) College allotment. GATE illamalum sila colleges-la seralaam (sponsored/self-financing). Govt college fee: â‚¹10,000-30,000/year.

samples.instruction: TATA Scholarship for students enna?
samples.current_output: TATA Group Scholarships: 1) Tata Capital Pankh - â‚¹10,000-12,000/year for Class 6-12 2) Tata Trusts Higher Education - â‚¹50,000-2 lakh/year professional courses 3) Lady Tata Memorial Trust - Medical research. Eligibility: Income â‚¹4 lakh kizha, 60%+ marks. Apply: Buddy4Study portal or direct application. Deadline varies.

samples.instruction: Merchant Navy join aaga enna padikkanum?
samples.current_output: Courses: 1) B.Sc Nautical Science (3 years) - Deck Officer 2) Marine Engineering (4 years) - Engine room 3) GP Rating (6 months) - Entry level. Eligibility: 12th PCM 60%+, Medical fitness strict. Institutes: IMU Chennai, AMET Chennai, MERI. Admission: IMU CET entrance exam. Career: High salary (â‚¹50,000 - â‚¹5 lakh/month with experience), World travel. Challenges: Months away from family.

samples.instruction: Government job salary ranges
samples.current_output: TNPSC Group 1: â‚¹56,100-1,77,500 (DSP, DC level). Group 2: â‚¹35,400-1,12,400 (Assistant level). Group 4: â‚¹19,500-62,000 (Clerk level). Banking PO: â‚¹40,000-80,000+. SSC CGL: â‚¹35,000-1,50,000. Teaching (TRB): â‚¹35,000-70,000. Note: Includes DA, HRA, benefits.

samples.instruction: Polytechnic-la endha branch select seivathu? Job opportunity eppadi?
samples.current_output: Branch wise opportunities: 1) Mechanical - Manufacturing, automobile companies 2) Civil - Construction, PWD, real estate 3) Electrical - TNEB, industries, electrician 4) Electronics - IT companies, telecom 5) Computer Science - Software, IT support 6) Automobile - Service centers, companies. Highest demand: Mechanical, Civil. Growing: Computer Science. Government jobs: TNPSC Diploma level posts available.
